Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at Stony Island/57th.
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Exp. buses are temp. rerouted via Hyde Park, 57th, Lake Shore Drive, Marquette, & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Hyde Park, 57th, Lake Shore Drive, Marquette, and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/57th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local and # 28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at Stony Island/57th
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery & 28 Stony Island buses are temp. rerouted via Stony Island, 57th, LSD, Marquette, & Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local and # 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 57th, Lake Shore Drive, Marquette, and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/57th.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Lake
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses temp. rerouted NB: Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago, & Cicero; SB: Cicero, Division, Laramie, Washington, & Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cicero/Lake, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago, & Cicero.

Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Division, Laramie, Washington, & Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.
